title: People who use chatbots for news consider them unbiased and “good enough,” new study finds
description: Chatbots are already a burgeoning source of news. Seven percent of respondents in the U.S. use chatbots for news every week, according to a report last summer from the Reuters Institute for the Study of Journalism (RISJ). In India, that number jumps to nearly 20 percent. As AI chatbot usage only continues to grow, there’s...
